text:
Hi there, we are happy to hear that your business is one of the many businesses that is set to reopen. 
My name is Jane, and I distribute a UVC lamp that can disinfect to kill up to 99.9% of bacteria and viruses.
It can disinfect air, and surfaces up to 200sqft. This helps to add an additional layer of safety for your customers.
Each unit costs only $120 and lasts up to 5000hours.
Do PM me if you are interested. I can do a zoom demo for you.
We have ready stocks and can deliver to you before Friday.
